sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Evolv Technologies, Plexus Partner to Scale Manufacturing, Meet Global Demand
feed.summary: Evolv Technologies, Inc. has partnered with Plexus Corp. to streamline manufacturing operations and meet the rising global demand for its security solutions. Plexus's expertise will enable Evolv to scale production quickly, enhance product quality, and develop next-generation solutions for safety and security. The collaboration aims to strengthen Evolv's supply chain and accelerate its growth in the security industry.

feed.title: Halper Sadeh LLC Encourages Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. Shareholders to Contact the Firm to Discuss Their Rights
feed.summary: Halper Sadeh LLC, an investor rights law firm, is investigating whether officers and directors of Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVLV) breached their fiduciary duties to shareholders. Long-term Evolv shareholders are encouraged to contact the firm to potentially seek corporate governance reforms, the return of funds, or other relief. The firm handles such actions on a contingent fee basis, meaning shareholders would not incur upfront legal fees or expenses.

feed.title: Evolv Technology Selects Plexus as New Strategic Contract Manufacturing Partner
feed.summary: Evolv Technology has partnered with Plexus Corp. for strategic contract manufacturing, aiming to scale manufacturing, enhance its global supply chain, and meet growing demand for its AI-based security solutions. This collaboration is expected to increase capacity, support global expansion through Plexus' international network, and create cost-saving opportunities. The partnership will help Evolv Technology deploy its advanced security screening solutions to various venues worldwide.

feed.title: Evolv Technology Completes Restatement of Previously Issued Financial Statements and Reports Third Quarter, Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Financial Results
feed.summary: Evolv Technology announced the completion of its restatement of previously issued financial statements and reported financial results for Q3, Q4, and full year 2024. The company regained compliance with SEC reporting and NASDAQ listing requirements, achieving positive Adjusted EBITDA in Q4'24 and significant revenue growth year-over-year. The restatements corrected inaccurate accounting for certain sales transactions, with the company looking ahead to a new phase of growth focused on execution and compliance.

feed.title: How a Board Investigation into Financial Reporting at Evolv Technologies Holdings (EVLV) Has Changed Its Investment Story
feed.summary: A board investigation into Evolv Technologies Holdings (EVLV) for alleged financial statement misstatements and revenue recognition issues from Q2 2022 to Q2 2024 has brought scrutiny to the company's internal controls. While new contract wins, such as with the Buffalo Sabres, show operational momentum, investors must weigh these against the ongoing legal concerns regarding financial transparency. The investigation highlights potential weaknesses in the company's financial practices and affects its investment narrative despite projected revenue growth.

feed.title: EVOLV ALERT: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is Investigating
feed.summary: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is investigating potential claims against Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVLV) on behalf of long-term stockholders. This follows a class action complaint alleging that Evolv's financial statements from Q2 2022 to Q2 2024 contained material misstatements due to misconduct related to revenue recognition. The company's stock price declined approximately 40% after the announcement of these issues.

feed.title: Evolv Technologies Q2 Earnings Call Highlights Growth
feed.summary: Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (EVLV) reported strong Q2 2025 results, with notable revenue growth of 29% year-over-year to $32.5 million and an Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) of $110.5 million, up 27% year-over-year. The company achieved its third consecutive quarter of positive adjusted EBITDA, increased liquidity, and expanded its global customer base to over 1,000, while also resolving significant legal issues. Despite a slight decline in adjusted gross margin to 55%, Evolv raised its full-year revenue growth expectations to between 27% and 30%, signaling a positive outlook for fiscal year 2025.

feed.title: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman, LLC Is Investigating Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (EVLV) And Encourages Stockholders to Connect
feed.summary: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman, LLC is investigating potential claims against Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (EVLV) and certain officers/directors for alleged corporate wrongdoing. The firm encourages stockholders who purchased EVLV securities prior to August 19, 2022, and still hold them, to contact them to assist with the investigation. The representation is on a contingency fee basis.

feed.title: EVOLV TECHNOLOGIES Earnings Results: $EVLV Reports Quarterly Earnings
feed.summary: EVOLV TECHNOLOGIES ($EVLV) reported its quarterly earnings on August 14th, with an earnings per share of -$0.25, missing estimates, but revenue of $32,540,000, exceeding expectations. Insider trading activity showed two sales and no purchases in the last six months, while hedge funds exhibited mixed activity with some adding and others decreasing their positions. The company also received $18,000 in government contracts and has analyst ratings including one "Outperform" with a median price target of $6.5 from two analysts.

feed.title: Earnings call transcript: Evolv Technologies Q2 2025 beats EPS forecasts
feed.summary: Evolv Technologies (EVLV) reported strong Q2 2025 results, with an EPS of -0.02 USD and revenue of 32.5 million USD, both surpassing analyst forecasts. Despite beating expectations, the stock experienced a slight decline in after-hours trading. The company raised its 2025 revenue growth guidance to 27-30% and expects positive full-year adjusted EBITDA, driven by a strategic shift to direct purchase subscription models and expanded market presence in education and healthcare.

feed.title: Evolv Technologies' metal detection system under scrutiny
feed.summary: Evolv Technologies' metal detection systems, implemented at Antioch High School after a shooting, are under scrutiny due to difficulties in calibration. Critics argue that low sensitivity settings risk missing weapons, while high settings lead to numerous false alarms requiring secondary screenings. The company has faced prior controversies, including an FTC settlement, an SEC investigation, and executive leadership changes, further highlighting concerns about the technology's effectiveness and cost.

feed.title: Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. Securities Fraud Class Action Lawsuit Pending: Contact The Gross Law Firm Before December 31, 2024 to Discuss Your Rights - EVLV
feed.summary: The Gross Law Firm is notifying shareholders of Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVLV) about a pending securities fraud class action lawsuit. Shareholders who purchased EVLV shares between August 19, 2022, and October 30, 2024, are encouraged to contact the firm to discuss potential lead plaintiff appointment before the December 31, 2024, deadline. The lawsuit alleges that Evolv's financial statements contained material misstatements regarding revenue recognition and other metrics.

feed.title: Kirby McInerney LLP Reminds Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (EVLV) Investors of Class Action Filing and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm
feed.summary: Kirby McInerney LLP has filed a class action lawsuit against Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (EVLV) on behalf of investors who acquired securities between August 19, 2022, and October 30, 2024. The lawsuit alleges material misstatements in Evolv's financial statements regarding revenue recognition and other metrics, leading to significant stock price declines and the termination of its CEO. Investors are encouraged to contact the firm to learn more about their rights and potentially apply to be lead plaintiff.

feed.title: Class Action Lawsuit Against Evolv Alleges Misconduct in Sales to Channel Partner
feed.summary: Evolv Technologies is facing multiple class-action lawsuits for allegedly misreporting revenues and engaging in sales misconduct with a major channel partner, leading to a significant drop in its stock price. Concurrently, the company is also under investigation by the FTC for making misleading claims about the effectiveness of its AI-powered security screening systems, particularly in school settings. These issues have resulted in a leadership change, with the CEO and CFO resigning and several other employees being terminated or resigning.

feed.title: FTC: AI ‘Weapons Detection’ Co. Evolv Misled Schools About its Safety Abilities
feed.summary: The Federal Trade Commission has accused Evolv Technology, a company selling AI-powered security screening systems, of making deceptive claims about its ability to detect weapons and ensure safety in schools. While Evolv announced a settlement without admitting wrongdoing or monetary penalties, it agreed to offer certain K-12 customers a 60-day window to cancel contracts, potentially impacting $3.9 million in annual revenue. Critics and past incidents, including a New York City subway pilot program and a student stabbing incident, have raised concerns about the efficacy of Evolv's technology.

feed.title: Class Action Filed Against Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (EVLV) Seeking Recovery for Investors - Contact Levi & Korsinsky
feed.summary: A class action securities lawsuit has been filed against Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVLV) by Levi & Korsinsky, LLP, seeking to recover losses for investors who purchased shares between August 19, 2022, and October 30, 2024. The lawsuit alleges that Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. made false and misleading statements related to improper revenue recognition and other reported metrics, distorting the company's financial performance. Investors affected by these alleged misstatements have until December 31, 2024, to request to be appointed as lead plaintiff.

feed.title: Can Evolv Stock Recover From Its Massive Self-Inflicted Drop?
feed.summary: Shares of Evolv Technologies (NASDAQ: EVLV) dropped significantly after the company reported accounting irregularities related to sales practices, impacting financial statements from Q2 2022 to Q2 2024. This news comes after a negative pilot program report in New York subway stations and prior scrutiny regarding product effectiveness. Analysts have downgraded the stock, but bullish options activity suggests potential short-term recovery, though long-term investor sentiment remains cautious ahead of upcoming earnings.
